## A nice coworking office !

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng=6.139094, lat=46.199793, popup="<a href='http://lamusebouge.ch/'>La Muse Bouge</a>" )
my_map

```
